price: 47. To bobangi (bwa makasi kowuta epai ya Nkolo wa bango ezua bango) ya soló, Nkolo wa bino azali na ngolu atonda mawa.
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ تَخَوُّفٖ فَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
